caption.title:
A boxplot of ensemble mean estimates for epidemiological parameters D (days) and R
0 at the observed peak, 2 weeks after the peak, and on the last week of simulation for all seasons and regions.
caption.p: The central line indicates the median, the box provides the interquartile range, and the whiskers give the extrema (outliers are shown, defined as 1.5 times greater the interquartile range).
